Author: beautiful_ashes
Text: It's good that you stepped in though and that she was able to recover. I don't think your own struggle makes you a hypocrite. I think it's always easier for us to be gentle and logical when thinking or dealing with someone we care about over ourselves.

Author: forgetremembering
Text: When I was in high school I told my mother that my friend didn't eat for 3 days and asked her to call my friend's mom for me. The moms talked and it gave my friend less freedom at first, but eventually she had the support of her family to help her escape.  Initially she hated me for outing her but eventually she was okay with my lame version of support.  The silly thing to me is that she is the only real life person I've told about my eating disorder. She has long since recovered and I haven't and the last time I saw her I was at one of my lowest weights.  I'm a total hypocrite.
